item.title: Docker-Compose
item.description: docker-compose.yml version: "3" services: hugo: image: nginx:latest volumes: - /home/user/compose/hugo/sdn_notice/public/:/usr/share/nginx/html/ networks: backend: proxy: image: nginx:latest ports: - "80:80" - "443:443" volumes: - /home/user/compose/proxy:/etc/nginx/conf.d/:ro networks: backend: application: image: nginx:latest volumes: - /home/user/compose/application/:/usr/share/nginx/html/ networks: backend: proxy: image: nginx:latest ports: - "80:80" - "443:443" volumes: - /home/user/compose/proxy:/etc/nginx/conf.
